snippet.title: Project MIKHAIL Producer Letter #4
snippet.description:
In the fourth Producer Letter, we'll talk about the upcoming February update and the role and future of Project MIKHAIL.
And last but not least, we'll do a real talk about the early access!
We hope you enjoy this last Producer's Letter for 2021.

◆Each section be found here◆

00:00：Greetings
00:28：About February's Update
01:01：Addition of Free Camera
01:36：Implementation of Walking Motion
01:38：Targeting System Update
02:10：QoL Update For Dismantling/Selling Parts
02:49：English/JP Voice Switching
03:18：About Project MIKHAIL's Role and Future
08:38：Real Talk About the Early Access
10:42：Ending talk

#ProjectMIKHAIL
#MuvLuv
